name: Dark Fantasy Tower Defense Tactics Strategy with Timer
name_original: Dark Fantasy Tower Defense Tactics Strategy with Timer
description:
PLEASE DOWNLOAD THE DOCUMENT TO SEE THE TOWER MANUAL!!!

CONTROLS:

TILE SELECTION: ARROWS

PLACE SINGLE TARGET TOWER: 1

PLACE AoE TOWER: 2

PLAY/SKIP WAVE TIMER (TO GET GOLD): ENTER

PLACE 2x2 OR 3x3 TOWERS TO MERGE THEM INTO BIGGER ONES

GAME BY SANNYIX, MICRIKACIK, HARVY008 AND GARY THE STROYER.
